original_text:
Will you play with him as with a bird,
    or will you put him on a leash for your girls?
korean_text: 네가 어찌 그것을 새를 가지고 놀 듯 하겠으며 네 여종들을 위하여 그것을 매어두겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Will you play with him as with a bird
or will you put him on a leash for your girls?
sentences.korean_translation: 아니면 네 딸들을 위해 그에게 목줄을 채우겠느냐?
